LanguageData.Plant_MSOpiumPoppy.label: Opium Poppy
LanguageData.Plant_MSOpiumPoppy.description: A species of flowering plant in the family Papaveraceae. It is the species of plant from which opium and poppy seeds are derived
LanguageData.MSOPSeedPod.label: Opium Seed Pod
LanguageData.MSOPSeedPod.description: Seed pods from the opium poppy flower. These pods can be used to extract poppy seeds or opium latex.
LanguageData.MSOpiumLatex.label: Opium Latex
LanguageData.MSOpiumLatex.description: Latex produced by opium poppy seed pods, it contains a class of naturally occurring alkaloids known as opiates.
LanguageData.MSPoppySeeds.label: Poppy Seeds
LanguageData.MSPoppySeeds.description: These tiny kidney-shaped seeds have been harvested from the dried seed pods of the opium poppy. The seeds can be used whole or ground into meal as an ingredient in many foods.
